evaluation.name: Profit Target
evaluation.description: Account must reach profit target without breaching trailing drawdown.

evaluation.name: Trailing Drawdown
evaluation.description: Balance must not fall below trailing drawdown buffer.

evaluation.name: Minimum Trading Days
evaluation.description: At least 7 distinct trading days are required before evaluation completion.

evaluation.name: End of Day Flat
evaluation.description: All positions must be closed by end of trading day.

evaluation.name: Account Resets
evaluation.description: Number of evaluation resets must not exceed allowance.

funded.name: Stop-Loss Required
funded.description: Every trade must have a stop-loss order attached.

funded.name: Consistency Rule
funded.description: â‰¤30% of total profit in any single day (first phase).

funded.name: Half-Contract Scaling
funded.description: Position size may only scale by half the previous step.

funded.name: No All-In / Windfall
funded.description: Single-day profits may not exceed 50% of total.

funded.name: Trailing Drawdown Lock
funded.description: Trailing drawdown locks once profit target achieved.

funded.name: News Trading Ban
funded.description: Trading during restricted news events is not allowed.

payout.name: Safety Net
payout.description: Balance must remain above safety net after payout.

payout.name: Payout Cadence
payout.description: Payout requests must be at least 8 days apart.

payout.name: Profit Split
payout.description: Payout percentage must not exceed agreed split.
